Title: Using the Microsoft Kinect to control GoogleMap
Description:
The project is a WPF application that uses Microsoft Kinect to control google maps.

Feel free to learn WPF MVVM pattern and Kinect development from it!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The project is a WPF application that uses Microsoft Kinect to control google maps.

Feel free to learn WPF MVVM pattern and Kinect development from it!


Guests, reviewers and contributors are welcome :-)


Sample screen:



List of available moves:
  • Zooming by using SwipeIn? and SwipeOut?.
  • Moving map by using left hand.
  • Setting flag by doing right hello.
  • Joining flags by joining hands.
  • Moving map by head.
  • Disable and enable head control by hand over head.
  • Disable and enable left hand control by left hello posture.

Other features:
  • Skeleton is displayed as one moves
  • Log box available
  • Record/play your moves using buttons from the bottom-left panel.


Please make sure you read the Prerequisites and installation
